title: Ravikula Raghurama
overview: This love story follows Gowtham and Nisha, whose contrasting personalities bring them together. Nisha, initially skeptical about genuine love, deceives Gowtham but later realizes her deep yearning for him after a chance accident. The loss of her grandmother enlightens her about the value of love. Ultimately, Nisha defies expectations as she returns to Gowtham, confessing her feelings.
